channel.title: Help! i dont know how to make a monster how do i make them its confusing
channel.description:
i been playin on my server but i dont know how to spawn a monster its hard , do u have to change a thing to another, oh yea and how do u make a shop keeper sell items he would not recently sell can anyone help.
From:guthan554

item.title: Help! i dont know how to make a monster how do i make them its confusing
item.dc:creator: @pk3r0fz4mmy pk3r0fz4mmy
item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

did you make urself mod? if no log off, go to the characters file in your pserver source, and pick yours, change the playerrights to 3.

once youve done this type in ::npc 2745 (tz-tok-jad)

if you want to become an npc type ::pnpc 2745 (to become tz-tok-jad)

Read full topic
